verses.roman:
tomāra nābhi-padma haite āmāra janmodaya
tumi pitā-mātā, āmi tomāra tanaya

synonyms: tomāra-Your; nābhi-padma-lotus of the navel; haite-from; āmāra-my; janma-udaya-birth; tumi-You; pitā-father; mātā-mother; āmi-I; tomāra-Your; tanaya-son.
translation: "I took birth from the lotus that grew from Your navel. Thus You are both my father and my mother, and I am Your son.
